rule: Descriptions can be written in any language and may contain grammatical errors or inappropriate vocabulary.
input: Un hombre corriendo en el parque con zapatos nuevos.
output: An energetic man in new running shoes dashes through a serene park shaded by ancient oak trees at dawn, sunlight filtering through dappled leaves adding golden accents to his sprint.
complianceText:
The output provides a clear subject description, timing, lighting, and background within a single paragraph under 80 words. However, it does not explicitly conclude by conveying the feeling the image should evoke.
